metadata.title: CVE-2016-6233 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The (1) order and (2) group methods in Zend_Db_Select in the Zend Frameworkbefore 1.12.19 might allow remote attackers to conduct SQL injectionattacks via vectors related to use of the character pattern [\w]* in aregular expression.

criterions.comment: php-zend-db package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
